metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6911 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The dynamicGetbuf function in the GD Graphics Library (aka libgd) before2.2.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-boundsread) via a crafted TIFF image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6911` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.5
libgd3 - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.5
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.5').
